events.name: ReturnInitiated
events.description: Captures the start of the return process by the customer.

events.name: ReturnApproved
events.description: Indicates that the return request has been approved after review.

events.name: ReturnDeclined
events.description: Records the instance when a return request is denied.

events.name: ReturnCompleted
events.description: Marks the return process as completed.

commands.name: InitiateReturn
commands.description: Captures the start of the return process by the customer.

commands.name: ApproveReturn
commands.description: Indicates that the return request has been approved after review.

commands.name: DeclineReturn
commands.description: Records the instance when a return request is denied.

commands.name: CompleteReturn
commands.description: Marks the return process as completed.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerService
integrationPoints.description: Integration with Customer Service to handle inquiries related to returns.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrate with Inventory to adjust stock levels upon return processing.
